images.title: Acadia - For spring break of my sophomore year, I visited Acadia National Park with some of my friends. It had lots of memorable scenery and many fun rock formations to climb!

Hack - HackMIT was a big part of my MIT experience in my sophomore year, it's where I met many of my closest friends and it was a really fun and memorable experience working through many sleepless nights to put such a big event together!
Strawberry Pocky - These packs of strawberry pocky really evoked my nostalgia, because I loved them so much last year that I would always carry around a pack with me.
Winter - During IAP there was a massive amount of snow that fell all over campus, and going out with friends in all that snow was definitely one of the most memorable parts of the year.
The empT - The MTBA was a big part of how I got around Boston as a student. This photo reminds me of how different Boston was last year with the T almost always being empty.
